short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Picture-in-Picture extension for the Chrome browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Picture-in-Picture allows web pages to play a video in a little window that stays on top of other windows. This feature is valuable for users that want to continue watching their videos while doing something else.
